testsuite.name: common settings
testsuite.details:
1. Acces the site.
  2. Click on the menus
  3. Use the languages menu
  4. Use the Sign Up menu
  5. Use the Sign in menu
  6. "SEE ALL PROCESSES" button
  7. Acces a processes
  8. "SEE ALL ASSEMBLIES" button
  9. Acces an assembly
  10. "PARTICIPATE" button
  11. "MORE INFO" button
  12. Return to home page via HOME button
  13. Return to home page via LOGO button
  14. Register button1
  15. Register Button2
  16. Bottom menus
  17. Social network buttons

testcase.name: DEC-V1-TC-LANGUAGE CAT
testcase.summary:
Decidim sites are multilanguage.

There must be a pop-down menu in the upper part of the site to switch languages.

By default there are three languages: catalan, castillano, english

This TC has to check out that the menu works correctly switching between the different languages and the selected languages stays actives even if you navigate to another page.
testcase.preconditions:
A decidim site has to be no-line.

Use http://staging.decidim.codegram.com/

step.expectedresults: the site is online and fully loaded
the pop-dowm menu appears and display the other languages
the language selected must be visible in the top part of the site when the pop-down menu dissapears

step.actions: assert that the top menu is in catalan
step.expectedresults:
the top menu must have at least the following options:

  1. inici
  2. processos
  3. assemblees
  4. més informació

step.actions:
assert that the following pages are in catalan:

  1. inici
  2. processos
  3. assemblees
  4. més informació
step.expectedresults: Each Page must hav catalan text

step.actions: Return to home page and assert that is in catalan
step.expectedresults: the language menu must be in catalan and the text must be catalan

testcase.name: DEC-V1-TC-LANGUAGE ENGL
testcase.summary:
Decidim sites are multilanguage.

There must be a pop-down menu in the upper part of the site to switch languages.

By default there are three languages: catalan, castillano, english

This TC has to check out that the menu works correctly switching between the different languages and the selected languages stays actives even if you navigate to another page.
testcase.preconditions:
A decidim site has to be no-line.

Use http://staging.decidim.codegram.com/

step.expectedresults: the site is online and fully loaded
the pop-dowm menu appears and display the other languages
the language selected must be visible in the top part of the site when the pop-down menu dissapears

step.actions: assert that the top menu is in english
step.expectedresults:
the top menu must have at least the following options:

  1. home
  2. processes
  3. assemblies
  4. more information

step.actions:
assert that the following pages are in english:

  1. home
  2. processes
  3. assemblies
  4. more information
step.expectedresults: Each Page must have english text

step.actions: Return to home page and assert that its in English
step.expectedresults: the language menu must be in English and the text must be English

testcase.name: DEC-V1-TC-LANGUAGE CAST
testcase.summary:
Decidim sites are multilanguage.

There must be a pop-down menu in the upper part of the site to switch languages.

By default there are three languages: catalan, castillano, english

This TC has to check out that the menu works correctly switching between the different languages and the selected languages stays actives even if you navigate to another page.
testcase.preconditions:
A decidim site has to be no-line.

Use http://staging.decidim.codegram.com/

step.expectedresults: the site is online and fully loaded
the pop-dowm menu appears and display the other languages
the language selected must be visible in the top part of the site when the pop-down menu dissapears

step.actions: assert that the top menu is in castillano
step.expectedresults:
the top menu must have at least the following options:

  1. inicio
  2. procesos
  3. asambleas
  4. más información

step.actions:
assert that the following pages are in castillano:

  1. inicio
  2. procesos
  3. asambleas
  4. más información
step.expectedresults: Each Page must have castillian text

step.actions: Return to home page and assert that is in castillian
step.expectedresults: the language menu must be in castellano and the text must be in castellano

testsuite.name: SIGN UP PAGE
testsuite.details: Use of the Sign up menu and page

testcase.name: DEC-V1-TC-SIGN-UP-LOG-IN
testcase.summary: This test case will verify whethere user can succesfully access the the sign in page through the LOG-IN BUTTON
testcase.preconditions: User should be in the sign up page

step.expectedresults: the icon should change to a hand and the red bar should change color slightly
the page should change to the log-UP page.

testcase.summary: This test case will verify whethere user can succesfully access the the sign up page through the SIGN-UP BUTTON
testcase.preconditions: User should be in the sign in page

step.actions:
hover over the:

catala:INICIAR SESSIÓ

spanish: INICIAR SESIÓN

BUTTON
step.expectedresults: the icon should change to a hand

step.actions:
click on the:

english: LOG-IN

catala:INICIAR SESSIÓ

spanish: INICIAR SESIÓN

BUTTON
step.expectedresults: the page should change to the log-in page.

testsuite.name: SIGN IN PAGE
testsuite.details: Use of the SIGN IN  button and the login page

testcase.name: DEC-V1-TC-SIGN-IN-NEGATIVE-invalid user valid password
testcase.summary: This test case will verify the behavior of webpage when user enteres an invalid username with valid password
testcase.preconditions:
User should be in the login page

There should be a password provided after signing up in the register page or provided by managment for testing pourposses.

The user should be already created active user accounts

step.expectedresults:
1. user should be able to type in username text field
  2. entered user name should be displayed to the user

User should be able to type in password field

Entered password should be masked

warning message should be displayed to the user

message cat: Invalid Correu electrònic or password.

message ing: Invalid Email or password.

message spanish: Correo electrónico o contraseña inválida.

keyword.name: smoke
keyword.notes: test cases applicable to smoke test

keyword.name: functional
keyword.notes: test cases applicable to functional test

testcase.name: DEC-V1-TC-SIGN-IN-POSITIVE
testcase.summary: This test case will verify whethere user can succesfully logged in to the sign in page with a valid username and a valid password.
testcase.preconditions:
User should be in the login page

There should be a user name and a password provided after signing up in the register page or provided by managment for testing pourposses.

The user should be already created active user accounts

step.expectedresults:
1. user should be able to type in username text field
  2. entered user name should be displayed to the user

User should be able to type in password field

Entered password should be masked
User should be redirected to the homepage
